content:
Yes, Larsen & Toubro (L&T) is one of the major contractors involved in the construction of the Mumbai-Ahmedabad High-Speed Rail (MAHSR) project. As per the information available, L&T has been awarded three packages for the construction of the project. These packages are:

1. C4: Zaroli Village to Vadodara, Gujarat - worth approximately Rs. 7,289 crore
2. C6: Vapi Station to Karambeli, Maharashtra - worth approximately Rs. 2,064 crore
3. C7: Karambeli to Surat, Gujarat - worth approximately Rs. 7,289 crore

L&T is responsible for the design and construction of the viaducts, stations, bridges, and tunnels in these sections of the project. Additionally, L&T is also involved in the procurement of equipment and materials, project management, and coordination with other contractors and stakeholders.
